Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.http.api.service.mapping.annotations.parameters.query

Annotation Interface QueryParameter

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(PARAMETER) public @interface QueryParameter
Marks a parameter of a Method those variable value is used for the forming of a query part of a request URI.

Required types:

  • primitive
  • primitive wrappers
  • String
  • Any object whose string representation may be read as a query parameter value correctly. See Object.toString()
  • Arrays of types described above
  • Iterable of described above
  • Maps of keys and values of types described above
  • A POJO whose class has fields of following types: primitive types, primitive wrappers, String, any type of an object whose string representation may be read as a part of a query parameter value correctly, see Object.toString(), arrays and iterables of listed types. Class of a POJO should extend MappedObject

  • Element Details

    • name

      String name
      Returns:
      a name of http query parameter

    • required

      boolean required
      Returns:
      is parameter required or not. Default value is true. It allows or doesn't allow null values of a parameter on a method invocation.
      Default:
      true
